reviews.review: It was a great film! A bit rushed at times, but very epic. No thanks to RJ is what caused this rushed feel. It truly was Reys/ Bens story. I did wish there were certain aspects to have been incorporated, but that honestly would detract from what this trilogy was meant to be. The next generation. And the poetic Ironic Justice of the Siths defeat. Brilliant. If TLJ were to reveal one large point I think this film would have flowed better and would not have be required to be rushed. Its worth our respect.

I have been a major Star Wars fan since'77. I grew up with this franchise and have loved it my whole life. I liked this movie. It does move a bit too quickly. There are a number of eye rolling moments. That being said, I think this was a satisfying conclusion to the saga.
Thought it was a perfect conclusion to the trilogy, wouldnt change anything
As a huge Star Wars fan, I was hugely satisfied with how the Skywalker saga ended!!!  I appreciated that the movie paid homage to all those characters that came before!!!!

Just saw Rise of Skywalker & completely baffled by the negativity. I saw IV in the theater as a 5yo, and I've loved the franchise my whole life (except for the prequels which sucked). I enjoyed VII & VIII, flaws and all. I thought Rise was perfect. Couldn't've asked for a better end to the entire series.
loved the recall of many of the members of the first star wars movie from 1977.
Fuck the critics, Rise of the Skywalker is amazing!

This is a direct sequel to The Force Awakens, so you don’t have to watch The Last Jedi ever again. I left the theater wanting to come back and watch it again. When I left the theater after watching The Last Jedi I was upset and it took me weeks to come to terms that that was it... that movie was canon and could not be undone. The Rise of Skywalker is a fun movie (not the best way to end the Skywalker Saga at all) given what JJ had to work with. Not nearly as bad as the “critics” claim it was. I have spoken!
Actors were phenomenal, great ending to the saga, my two boys are content!
It exactly what it should be, my 10 years old gave it a *****
